articles.title: Biden bans offshore drilling across huge area of US - BBC.com
articles.description: The ban covering most of America's coastline comes two weeks before Donald Trump's inauguration ceremony.
articles.content:
US President Joe Biden has announced a ban on new offshore oil and gas drilling along most of America's coastline, weeks before Donald Trump takes office.
